About me

I work on web-development at UOB Singapore.

I enjoy street latin dancing - creeping around at developer meetups, competitive gaming, bouldering, trying to be sneaky, python and solving programming problems. I also think I can write well, but truth be told - my writing is as bad as my cooking. I live in the armpit of Singapore

In a previous life, I prepared Science experiments/examinations for both Singaporean and British students in local/boarding schools. I’m competitive. I try to consistently maintain my gaming skills by finishing in top 200 world rankings for Starcraft II & Dota 2 every season.

If something on my blog helped you or if you’re a junior developer wanting to connect, I’d love to hear from you.

Find me on GitHub or email me at khairulslt@hotmail.sg
